title: ‘This is unreal’: Newsbusters’ video shows how the media’s been OBSESSED with impeachment since ‘within days of Trump’s election’
text:
Everybody who pays attention to the media and politics knows that the calls to “impeach Trump” have been frequent and the reasons have been many (and when those charges don’t come to fruition they move on to something else). Here’s a video from Newsbusters that helps show just how early and often the impeachment calls have been made on television. It’s pretty amazing:

The media started pushing impeachment within days of President Trump's election. pic.twitter.com/EmqGAQ8JX9 — NewsBusters (@newsbusters) September 30, 2019

WOW. It sounds like some therapy might be in order.

Interested in reading about how the liberal media have been wanting to throw the President out of office since he was elected? Check out our full post here! https://t.co/ai2tJOTmIO — NewsBusters (@newsbusters) October 1, 2019

And if they can’t throw Trump out of office, maybe Kamala Harris can help take away his Twitter account.

The Democrats gone wild. — Mary Curtis (@BHMary) September 30, 2019

If these aren't examples TDS (Trump Derangement Syndrome) Then I don't know what it is! @newsbusters https://t.co/pRgwTKjGkL — Donald Thornton (@Xservativestalk) September 30, 2019

I think this qualifies as an obsession….hope they are enjoying it while they can!! https://t.co/9FKnwo9tVX — Chris N (@chgochris) September 30, 2019

The media’s obsessed? Just a little.
